p: In a previous study, three SM per day with self-treatment were performed and after 1 week 58% of patients were cured ( 18). In our study with nine SM maneuvers per day, 57% were cured after only 2 days; after 1 week of nine SM per day 86% were free of symptoms. This comparison shows that the number of maneuvers per day also seems to be relevant. Therefore, we would suggest nine instead of three per day.
